Package org.innoboon.utils

Class FileOperations

java.lang.Object
org.innoboon.utils.FileOperations
public class FileOperations extends Object
Utility class for performing operations on a list of files, such as calculating the sum, average, or filtering based on prefixes or suffixes.

  • Method Details

    • sum

      public static List<ResponseData> sum(List<File> files, String columnName)
      Calculates the sum of numeric values in the specified column from CSV and JSON files.
      Parameters:
      files - The list of files to process.
      columnName - The name of the column to perform the sum operation.
      Returns:
      A list of ResponseData objects containing the column name and its corresponding sum.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an unsupported file type is encountered or if there is an issue with the file content.

    • average

      public static Map<String,Double> average(List<File> files, String columnName)
      Calculates the average of numeric values in the specified column from CSV and JSON files.
      Parameters:
      files - The list of files to process.
      columnName - The name of the column to perform the average operation.
      Returns:
      A map containing the column name and its corresponding average.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an unsupported file type is encountered or if there is an issue with the file content.

    • startsWith

      public static Map<String,List<String>> startsWith(List<File> files, String columnName, String prefix)
      Filters values in the specified column based on a prefix from CSV and JSON files.
      Parameters:
      files - The list of files to process.
      columnName - The name of the column to filter.
      prefix - The prefix to filter values.
      Returns:
      A map containing the column name and a list of filtered values.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an unsupported file type is encountered or if there is an issue with the file content.

    • endsWith

      public static Map<String,List<String>> endsWith(List<File> files, String columnName, String suffix)
      Filters values in the specified column based on a suffix from CSV and JSON files.
      Parameters:
      files - The list of files to process.
      columnName - The name of the column to filter.
      suffix - The suffix to filter values.
      Returns:
      A map containing the column name and a list of filtered values.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an unsupported file type is encountered or if there is an issue with the file content.

    • sneakyThrow

      public static <T> T sneakyThrow(Callable<T> callable)
      Executes a callable operation and wraps any checked exceptions into a runtime exception.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the result.
      Parameters:
      callable - The callable operation to execute.
      Returns:
      The result of the callable operation.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the callable operation throws a checked exception.
